title: Authors and Citation
text: Mo S (2025). ImageBinPlot: ImageBinPlot. R package version 0.0.1.0000, https://simoncmo.github.io/ImageBinPlot/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ImageBinPlot: ImageBinPlot},   author = {Simon Mo},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1.0000},   url = {https://simoncmo.github.io/ImageBinPlot/}, }

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Simple R function binning visualizing spatial transcriptomics data Seurat objects. utility supports cell-based expression data molecule-based transcript counts, optional identity overlays using scattermore. Designed Xenium data adaptable spatial datasets.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Binning: Aggregate spatial data grids customizable bin sizes. Visualization: Generate raster plots using ggplot2 viridis color scale. expression: cell-level transcript counts. molecule: individual transcript coordinates. Identity Overlay: Optionally overlay cell identities (e.g., clusters) using geom_scattermore. Multiple Fields View: Use ImageBinPlotFOVs generate plots multiple FOVs optional -scale adjustment. Multi-Object Plotting: Use ImageBinPlotObjects visualize spatial data across multiple Seurat objects. Customization: Adjust bin size, color scaling, transparency, layer order.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Clone Repository: Source Script: R session, source script:

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Install required R packages: tidyverse: data manipulation visualization. Seurat: handling spatial transcriptomics data. ggplot2: plotting. glue: string interpolation. scattermore: efficient scatter plot overlays. viridis: Provides color palettes. patchwork: combining multiple plots.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Load Seurat object source script:
code: obj <- readRDS("/path/to/your_seurat_object.rds") library(qs)  # Optional if using .qs files obj <- qread("/path/to/your_seurat_object.qs", nthreads = 30) source("ImageBinPlot.R")

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Plot binned expression data gene using ImageBinPlot:
code: # Plot expression of "EPCAM" with 10µm bins p <- ImageBinPlot(   obj,    feature = "EPCAM",    bin_size = 10,  # in µm   max_quantile = "q75",    type = "expression",   # palette from viridis   palette = 'viridis', # c('viridis', 'inferno', 'magma', 'plasma','cividis','mako','rocket','turbo')   palette_begin = 0,   palette_end = 1, ) ggsave("EPCAM_expression.pdf", p, width = 10, height = 10)

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Plot binned transcript counts gene:
code: # Plot molecule counts for "TP63" with 10µm bins p <- ImageBinPlot(   obj,    feature = "TP63",    bin_size = 10,    max_quantile = "q75",    type = "molecule" ) ggsave("TP63_molecules.pdf", p, width = 10, height = 10)

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Overlay Seurat clusters expression plot:
code: # Plot "EPCAM" expression with cluster overlay p <- ImageBinPlot(   obj,    feature = "EPCAM",    group.by = "seurat_clusters",    bin_size = 10,    max_quantile = "q75",   type = "expression",   ident_alpha = 0.3,    ident_pointsize = 1,    feature_on_top = TRUE ) ggsave("EPCAM_with_clusters.pdf", p, width = 10, height = 10)

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Show specific clusters:
code: # Overlay only cluster "0" on "EPCAM" p <- ImageBinPlot(   obj,    feature = "EPCAM",    group.by = "seurat_clusters",    filter_ident = "0",    bin_size = 10,    max_quantile = "q75",    type = "expression",   ident_alpha = 0.8,    feature_on_top = TRUE ) ggsave("EPCAM_cluster0.pdf", p, width = 10, height = 10)

what: Example 5: Batch Processing for a Single Object
title: ImageBinPlot
text: Generate plots multiple genes:
code: genes <- c("EPCAM", "TP63", "GeneX") pdf("batch_plots.pdf", width = 10, height = 10) for (gene in genes) {   p <- ImageBinPlot(     obj,      feature = gene,      bin_size = 10,      max_quantile = "q75",      type = "expression"   )   print(p) } dev.off()

what: Example 6: Plotting Multiple Fields of View (FOVs)
title: ImageBinPlot
text: Generate plots several FOVs using ImageBinPlotFOVs:
code: # Generate plots for all FOVs in the object with same scale p_fovs <- ImageBinPlotFOVs(   obj,    feature = "EPCAM",    bin_size = 10,    max_quantile = "q75",   same_scale = TRUE ) ggsave("EPCAM_all_FOVs.pdf", p_fovs, width = 10, height = 10)

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Combine plots multiple spatial transcriptomics objects:
code: # Assuming you have two Seurat objects: obj1 and obj2 p_objects <- ImageBinPlotObjects(   obj_list = list(obj1 = obj1, obj2 = obj2),    feature = "EPCAM",    bin_size = 10,    max_quantile = "q75",   same_scale = TRUE ) ggsave("EPCAM_multi_object.pdf", p_objects, width = 10, height = 10)

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Ensure Seurat object(s) contain required spatial data (centroids expression coordinate data molecules). Adjust max_quantile fine-tune color scaling. script designed Xenium data mind can adapted spatial data formats.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Visualize spatial transcriptomics data creating binning plots features (genes molecules) Seurat object.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Creates spatial binning plot specified feature (gene molecule) Seurat object.
code: ImageBinPlot(   obj,   feature,   group.by = NULL,   x_col = "x",   y_col = "y",   fov = Images(obj)[[1]],   x_min = NULL,   x_max = NULL,   y_min = NULL,   y_max = NULL,   bin_size = 10,   max_multiplier = NULL,   min = 0,   max_quantile = "q75",   type = "expression",   assay = "Xenium",   layer = "count",   palette = c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"),   palette_begin = 0,   palette_end = 1,   ident_alpha = 0.3,   ident_pointsize = 1,   filter_ident = NULL,   feature_on_top = TRUE,   flip_y = TRUE )

previous_headings: Function Details > Spatial Binning Plots > ImageBinPlot
title: ImageBinPlot
text: obj Seurat object containing spatial transcriptomics data. feature Character string specifying gene feature visualize. group.Optional character string; column name Seurat object identity overlay (e.g., cell type cluster). Default NULL. x_col Character string specifying column name x-coordinate values. Default "x". y_col Character string specifying column name y-coordinate values. Default "y". fov Character string specifying field view visualize; defaults first available FOV object (Images(obj)[[1]]). x_min Numeric; minimum x-coordinate limit. NULL, automatically set FOV’s centroid range. x_max Numeric; maximum x-coordinate limit. NULL, automatically set FOV’s centroid range. y_min Numeric; minimum y-coordinate limit. NULL, automatically set FOV’s centroid range. y_max Numeric; maximum y-coordinate limit. NULL, automatically set FOV’s centroid range. bin_size Numeric; size spatial bin (micrometers). Default 10. max_multiplier Numeric; deprecated multiplier color scale. Use max_quantile instead. Default NULL. min Numeric; minimum value color scale. Default 0. max_quantile Character string (e.g., "q75") specifying quantile determine maximum value color scale binned data. Default "q75". type Character string specifying type data plot; either "expression" (cell-based) "molecule" (individual transcript counts). Default "expression". type = "expression" resulting average values per bin, type = "molecule" values count molecules per bin. assay Character string specifying assay use data extraction Seurat object. Default "Xenium". layer Character string specifying data layer within assay use (e.g., "count"). Default "count". palette Character vector color palette options visualization (e.g., "viridis", "inferno", etc.). Default c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"). palette_begin Numeric; start position selected color palette. Default 0. palette_end Numeric; end position selected color palette. Default 1. ident_alpha Numeric; transparency level identity overlay points, 0 1. Default 0.3. ident_pointsize Numeric; point size identity overlay. Default 1. filter_ident Optional vector; filter include specific identities group.. Default NULL. feature_on_top Logical; TRUE, feature layer (binned data) rendered top identity overlay. Default TRUE. flip_y Logical; Whether flip y-axis. Default TRUE.

previous_headings: Function Details > Spatial Binning Plots > ImageBinPlot
title: ImageBinPlot
text: ggplot object representing spatial binning plot.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Generates bin plots multiple fields view (FOVs) Seurat object, option enforce scale across FOVs.
code: ImageBinPlotFOVs(   obj,   feature,   group.by = NULL,   fovs = NULL,   bin_size = 10,   min = 0,   max_quantile = "q75",   x_min = NULL,   x_max = NULL,   y_min = NULL,   y_max = NULL,   x_col = "x",   y_col = "y",   type = "expression",   assay = "Xenium",   layer = "count",   ident_alpha = 0.3,   ident_pointsize = 1,   palette = c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"),   palette_begin = 0,   palette_end = 1,   filter_ident = NULL,   feature_on_top = TRUE,   same_scale = FALSE,   ncol = NULL )

previous_headings: Function Details > Spatial Binning Plots > ImageBinPlotFOVs
title: ImageBinPlot
text: obj Seurat object containing spatial transcriptomics data. feature Character string specifying gene feature visualized. group.Optional character string; column identity overlay. Default NULL. fovs Vector FOV names plot. NULL, defaults available FOVs object (Images(obj)). bin_size Numeric; size spatial bins (micrometers). Default 10. min Numeric; minimum value color scale. Default 0. max_quantile Character string (e.g., "q75") determine maximum value color scale. Default "q75". x_min Numeric; optional minimum x-coordinate. Derived data NULL. x_max Numeric; optional maximum x-coordinate. Derived data NULL. y_min Numeric; optional minimum y-coordinate. Derived data NULL. y_max Numeric; optional maximum y-coordinate. Derived data NULL. x_col Character string specifying column name x-coordinate values. Default "x". y_col Character string specifying column name y-coordinate values. Default "y". type Character string; type data plot, either "expression" "molecule". Default "expression". assay Character string; assay use data extraction. Default "Xenium". layer Character string; data layer use extraction. Default "count". ident_alpha Numeric; transparency level identity overlay points, 0 1. Default 0.3. ident_pointsize Numeric; size identity overlay points. Default 1. palette Character vector color palette options plotting. Default c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"). palette_begin Numeric; start point color palette. Default 0. palette_end Numeric; end point color palette. Default 1. filter_ident Optional vector; filter include selected identities. Default NULL. feature_on_top Logical; TRUE, binned feature layer drawn top identity layer. Default TRUE. same_scale Logical; TRUE, forces FOV plots use color scale. Default FALSE. ncol Numeric; optional number columns arranging multiple FOV plots grid. Default NULL.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: patchwork ggplot object combining bin plots specified FOVs.

title: ImageBinPlot
text: Creates spatial binning plots multiple Seurat objects, optionally across multiple FOVs, option uniform scaling.
code: ImageBinPlotObjects(   obj_list,   feature,   group.by = NULL,   fovs_list = NULL,   bin_size = 10,   min = 0,   max_quantile = "q75",   x_min = NULL,   x_max = NULL,   y_min = NULL,   y_max = NULL,   x_col = "x",   y_col = "y",   type = "expression",   assay = "Xenium",   layer = "count",   ident_alpha = 0.3,   ident_pointsize = 1,   palette = c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"),   palette_begin = 0,   palette_end = 1,   filter_ident = NULL,   feature_on_top = TRUE,   same_scale = FALSE,   ncol = NULL )

previous_headings: Function Details > Spatial Binning Plots > ImageBinPlotObjects
title: ImageBinPlot
text: obj_list named list Seurat objects plotted. feature Character string; gene feature visualize across objects. group.Optional character string; grouping variable identity overlay across objects. Default NULL. fovs_list List FOV vectors corresponding object. NULL, defaults FOVs object via Images(.x). bin_size Numeric; size spatial bins (micrometers). Default 10. min Numeric; minimum value color scale. Default 0. max_quantile Character string (e.g., "q75") determine maximum value color scale. Default "q75". x_min Numeric; optional minimum x-coordinate limit. Determined per object/FOV NULL. x_max Numeric; optional maximum x-coordinate limit. Determined per object/FOV NULL. y_min Numeric; optional minimum y-coordinate limit. Determined per object/FOV NULL. y_max Numeric; optional maximum y-coordinate limit. Determined per object/FOV NULL. x_col Character string; column name x-coordinate values. Default "x". y_col Character string; column name y-coordinate values. Default "y". type Character string; data type visualize, either "expression" "molecule". Default "expression". assay Character string; assay used data extraction Seurat object. Default "Xenium". layer Character string; data layer within assay use. Default "count". ident_alpha Numeric; transparency level identity overlay points, 0 1. Default 0.3. ident_pointsize Numeric; size identity overlay points. Default 1. palette Character vector color palette options plotting. Default c("viridis", "inferno", "magma", "plasma", "cividis", "mako", "rocket", "turbo"). palette_begin Numeric; start point color palette. Default 0. palette_end Numeric; end point color palette. Default 1. filter_ident Optional vector; filter restrict identities plot. Default NULL. feature_on_top Logical; TRUE, binned feature layer drawn identity overlay. Default TRUE. same_scale Logical; TRUE, applies uniform color scale across objects FOVs. Default FALSE. ncol Numeric; optional number columns arranging combined plots grid. Default NULL.
